entry.title: HackTheBox[BOUNTYHUNTER]
entry.summary: BountyHunter is an easy rated CTF style machine at Hackthebox, the machine focuses on XXE (XML External Entity) injection to gain initial access to the machine and for escalating privilege to root we need to study the given python script in-order find the vulnerability and exploit it.
